reasoning_log: The matching process relied heavily on identifying unique architectural features and fixed installations. Kitchen (Image_5, back door), Dining Room (Image_4, tiled walls), and Garage (Image_15, striped floor) were matched with 100% certainty. The three Living Room views (Images 1, 2, 3) were differentiated by specific features: Image_3 showed the 'multiple windows' and 'shoe area' (玄關), while Image_1 showed the connection to the dining area. Bedrooms were separated based on the presence of built-in cabinets (Image_9) or accent walls (Images 6, 7). The two multi-functional room descriptions (Desc_11, Desc_12) were assigned to the two angles of the room featuring extensive built-in storage (Images 11, 12). Bathrooms were distinguished by their tile patterns and ceiling materials (Image_10: patterned floor; Image_13: wood ceiling/black wall; Image_14: all white). Although Desc_13 and Desc_14 are labeled as two angles of the same room, the visual evidence suggests they are two distinct bathrooms (Image_13 and Image_14), but they were matched based on elimination and specific features (wood ceiling for 13, all-white for 14). All 15 descriptions were matched 1:1.

matching_result_list.evidence: Living room view showing the connection to the dining area (與餐廳相連) and a standard window setup.
Close-up angle of the living room emphasizing the open layout and furniture arrangement, consistent with the '開放式客餐廳連結' tag.
Clearly shows two separate window units ('多窗設計') and shoes lined up in the foreground, indicating the '玄關鞋區預留'.
Dedicated dining space with distinctive marble-look wall tiles ('牆面磁磚包覆') and a spacious layout.
Galley-style kitchen ('狹長型廚房') with full cabinetry and a dark door visible at the end, confirming '後門對外'.

tag_list: 抽油煙機與瓦斯爐組合

matching_result_list.evidence: Empty bedroom with a light blue accent wall, fitting '牆面單色易布置' and '無固定家具'.
Different angle of the same room as Image_6, showing the corner and confirming the '規則長方格局'.
Empty room with white walls ('牆面留白') and a square layout ('空間方正'), suitable for a secondary bedroom or study.
The only bedroom image featuring a large, built-in white wardrobe/cabinetry ('內建衣櫃').
Bathroom featuring a deep black tiled shower wall ('深色淋浴牆面') and highly patterned floor tiles ('地面防滑磚').
Large multi-functional room ('大面積空間') dominated by a substantial built-in white cabinet wall ('內建大衣櫃').
Wider angle of the room in Image_11, emphasizing the full '收納牆面完整' and overall flow ('動線順暢').

tag_list: 牆面留白利於加裝家具

matching_result_list.evidence: Bathroom featuring a distinct wood ceiling detail ('上方木質天花') and a black accent shower wall, defining the independent shower area.
The remaining bathroom image, showing the toilet and sink configuration, with the shower spray head positioned near the toilet.

tag_list: 馬桶與洗手台配置合理

matching_result_list.evidence: Large, semi-open space with distinctive black and white striped flooring and two-tone tiled walls, matching the '車庫／騎樓' description.
